text: @tedcruz With all due respect Senator, brush up on your history. It was the Native Americans to begin with. Are you feeling OK? You have been tweeting nonsensical tweets far more than usual. Are you hallucinating? Hearing voices? Seriously. Coronavirus has some lingering symptoms.
